pages.text: Finely ground coal dust.$(br2)While not terribly useful as itself, its current state allows it to be easily alloyed with iron to create $(l:innovation/metallurgy/steel)rough steel$() in a crucible or alternatively mixed with $(l:innovation/materials/hellfire_dust)hellfire dust$() to create $(l:innovation/materials/nether_coal)nether coal$(), which I have no doubt would be a powerful fuel source.
